page.title: 06Description of Dalton
page.content: We went round Dalton which is a small rural village of about 200 people. There is a large house called Dalton Grange with lots of fancy windows and a boat in the garden. The other houses were very well looked after. There is only one telephone box and one post box and for shopping people have to go to Asda and other large stores as there are no shops in Dalton. There is a village school which has about 60 children and two members of staff. The majority of Dalton is used for farming or grazing; there is not much housing development. It is quiet and peaceful and people liked living there.
